title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1202.2 - Distance between moving vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1202.2 - Distance between moving vehicles

State Regulations

Each vehicle shall maintain a safe and prudent distance
behind the vehicle immediately preceding it in the same lane. See section
1202.8
for specific tunnel
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1202.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
